Name: Band of Outlaws
About the game: Join the Band and become an Outlaw! Play as Robin Hood and his Merry Men in this 2D Action Platformer. Help take back England from the diabolical Prince John. Battle your friends in a Local Multiplayer Deathmatch gamemode! Join the Band today, England needs you! Features: - Play as Robin, Marian, and many more! - Multiple Towns to take back and Bosses to beat - Local Multiplayer Deathmatch mode - Saved Merry Men to populate your Hideout in Sherwood Forest - Watch the gold you steal accumulate in your Hideout - Unlock secret characters for use in both Singleplayer and Multiplayer *IMPORTANT* *To play Multiplayer, you need at least 2 Controllers*
